title: Random and small increase in ping? Seems permanent so far
body: So not long before Patch 6.16 if not a few games after my ping went from a constant 39-40 with 0 spikes at all to a constant 51. I haven't changed any settings and it happened in between games with just the queue time and champ select between them. Its by far still playable but I would like too see if anyone else had this problem as well and see if I can fix or revert it. I've already went through the support page and checked everything I knew to check (ex: router, firewall, ports, dns, isp, Up/Down speed, and so on)

replies.body: Also happening to me, in the last hour it went from a solid 75 to 94. This is ridiculous.

A change in ping like this could be due to a network issue or even the way your ISP is routing to our servers.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a solid first step to troubleshoot your network.  You can also use a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these matches to see if anything is going wrong, like possible packet loss.  Hopefully, the results will provide some additional insight and troubleshooting!

I think its my ISP because Bard Solo Carry is getting the same thing and around the same amount as me and we both have Comcast and I went back a check all my settings and equipment again just in case and everything checks out fine
Same is your ISP Comcast? My ping increase around 10~ more than usual
